target.echo: creating distribution zip file jsmol.zip and copying it to Jmol
appletweb/jsmol.zip has been updated. site/jsmol is available for testing. Use the ?j2sdebugcode or ?j2sdebugcore for unminimized code versions in your browser
Done! You still need to run build.xml#dist so that the JSmol package is pjmolroperly integrated into Jmol for release
